rows.label: qev085102_MSG0001
rows.name: It's still smoking...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0002
rows.name: Bad guys' campfire![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0003
rows.name:
The residual heat signatures confirm it—
this fire was active until just recently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0004
rows.name: It's strange... A campfire doesn't strike me as their style...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_JNK0010
rows.name: Advise

rows.label: qev085102_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest you take a look around.

rows.label: qev085102_JNK0020
rows.name: Caution

rows.label: qev085102_SEL0021
rows.name: Warn the others that you heard something.

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0005
rows.name:
Good thinking. All right—let's give this place
the standard perimeter sweep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0006
rows.name: Elma, wait! Tatsu hear something![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0007
rows.name: Heard something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0008
rows.name: Someone's coming—everyone, hide![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0009
rows.name: Looks like we're too late.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0010
rows.name: Dammit... Those two could be anywhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0011
rows.name: Come on, that guy's the size of a mech![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0012
rows.name: There can't be that many places for him to hide.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0013
rows.name: Whatever. We'd better report to the captain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0014
rows.name: Soldiers definitely Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0015
rows.name: Elma, did you hear that? "Guy's the size of a mech."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0016
rows.name: And they're looking for a pair...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0017
rows.name:
But why would Dagahn and Ryyz...
I mean, they're Ganglion too, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0018
rows.name: Maybe they deserted after bitter defeat courtesy of Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0019
rows.name: Courtesy of who?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0020
rows.name: Still, it does sound like they're after our targets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0021
rows.name: Everything we've heard seems to point that way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0022
rows.name:
Maybe we should shake those two down for intel—
see what they know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0023
rows.name: What do you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev085102_SEL0031
rows.name: Go with Lin's plan and shake them down for intel.

rows.label: qev085102_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev085102_SEL0041
rows.name: Keep searching instead.

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0024
rows.name:
All right. We should be able to handle a couple of grunts
easily enough. Let's see what we can find out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085102_MSG0025
rows.name:
All right. Let's stay out of trouble and
keep searching the area. Come on.[ST:wait ]
